00027 #ifndef _K_HEAP_H_
00028 #define _K_HEAP_H_
00029 
00030 // Include indirect heaps
00031 #include "indirect_heap.h"
00032 
00033 // Include STL less comparison template (used by default)
00034 #include <functional>
00035 
00045 template <typename T, typename Compare = std::less<T>, typename idx = unsigned int>
00046 class k_heap {
00047 public:
00048 
00049         // Constructors and destructors
00050         k_heap(unsigned int k);         
00051         k_heap(const k_heap &heap);     
00052         ~k_heap();                      
00053 
00054         // Assignment operator
00055         k_heap &operator =(const k_heap &heap);         
00056 
00057         // Comparison operator
00058         bool operator ==(const k_heap &heap) const;     
00059 
00060         // Heap operations
00061         bool push(const T &elem);       
00062         void pop_best();                
00063         void pop_worst();               
00064 
00065         // Heap properties
00066         bool full() const;              
00067         bool empty() const;             
00068         unsigned int size() const;      
00069 
00070         const T &best() const;          
00071         const T &worst() const;         
00072 
00073         unsigned int get_K() const;     
00074         unsigned int count() const;     
00075 
00076 
00077         // STL-based names for heap operations and properties
00078         bool push_front(const T &elem) { return push(elem); }   
00079         bool push_back (const T &elem) { return push(elem); }   
00080 
00081         void pop_front() { pop_worst(); }                       
00082         void pop_back()  { pop_best(); }                        
00083 
00084         const T &front() const { return worst();  }             
00085         const T &back()  const { return best(); }               
00086 
00087 
00088 protected:
00089 
00090         unsigned int K;         
00091         T *data;                
00092 
00093         const Compare &compare;         
00094         static const idx root = 1;      
00095 
00096         indirect_heap<T, Compare, idx> bestHeap;                        
00097         indirect_heap<T, std::binary_negate<Compare>, idx> worstHeap;   
00098 };
00099 
00100 // Template implementation
00101 #include "k-heap.cpp"
00102 
00103 #endif
